item.title: [317][delta] ::reset(atk,str,def) tutorial
item.dc:creator: @Stijn12 Stijn12
item.description:
@Stijn12 wrote:

Difficulty: 1/10
Requirements: Copy+Paste
Ok, open up client.java and search for:
if(command.startsWith("unmute") && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); yell("Administrator "+playerName+" has just unmuted "+command.substring(7)+"."); unmuteuser(name); }

                       After the last "}" add:
                     Resetatk:
                   [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetatk")) {

if(playerXP[0] > 100000000){sM(“Your attack is not low enough to be considered glitched!”);return;}
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
int item = playerEquipment[r];
if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {sM(“Please remove ALL armor and weapons before using this command!”);return;}
}[/code]

                 Resetdef:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetdef")) { if(playerXP[1] > 1000000000){sM("Your defence is not low enough to be considered glitched!");return;} for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {sM("Please remove ALL armor and weapons before using this command!");return;} }
Resetstr:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetstr")) { if(playerXP[2] > 100000000){sM("Your strength is not low enough to be considered glitched!");return;} for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {sM("Please remove ALL armor and weapons before using this command!");return;} }

                            Then just compile and try out:
         ::resetatk
         ::resetstr
         ::resetdef

Read full topic
